Authentic Stay in Otterlo

Step into the world of Boerderij Voorste Eng. Our two renovated holiday homes, 'The Old Barn' and 'The Horse Stable', offer a unique combination of farm history and modern luxury.

Living & Atmosphere

The living rooms are furnished with an eye for detail. Authentic wooden beams are combined with a modern finish. Enjoy the underfloor heating, sink into the comfortable sofa, and feel right at home.

Smart TV
Underfloor heating
Atmospheric interior
Free WiFi

Cooking & Dining

The luxury open kitchen is fully equipped. Whether you want to prepare an extensive breakfast or cook a cozy dinner: dishwasher, combi-oven, induction hob, and Nespresso machine are ready for you.

Fully equipped
Dishwasher
Nespresso
Combi-oven

Sleep & Dream

A good night's sleep is priceless. Our bedrooms feature luxury box springs and high-quality bedding. The ensuite bathrooms have a spacious walk-in shower.

Boxspring beds
Walk-in shower
Beds made
Towels

Outdoor Living

Each apartment has its own private south-facing terrace. Enjoy the sun, the view of the garden, and the peace of the Veluwe.

Private terrace
Garden furniture
South-facing
Nature

Good to know

We strive for a carefree stay for all our guests. Here are some practical matters to keep in mind.

  • Check-in From 15:00
  • Check-out Until 10:30
  • Smoking Not allowed
  • Pets On request
